name: Fish Monger (apopasimil)
description:
Catch all the pearls then go to the pond and get the rod at the bottom.

All fish are required to get all the pearls.

Catch a fish and select which slot to put it in using q or e.

Fish with shift and space. Press shift to get in and out of fishing mode. Jump on fish if buggy.

Thank you for playing. Please leave your comments.
